name: Blowfish_Bell_Hat
description: The Blowfish Bell Hat is a simple, bell-shaped hat with a soft-looking and somewhat grainy texture. It changes color to match that of the wearer's ink and has a tiny, black and white version of the Firefin logo on the front.

name: Camo_Mesh
description: The Camo Mesh is a baseball cap with a mesh back and solid front. The brim and mesh are completely covered in a camouflage pattern that changes color to match that of the wearer's ink, and on the front is Firefin's name in stylized white Inkling text.

name: Firefin_Facemask
description: The Firefin Facemask is a face mask with part of the Firefin logo visible on it. The straps that connect to the ears are black.

name: FishFry_Biscuit_Bandana
description: The FishFry Biscuit Bandana is a bandana with a paisley-like design that incorporates elements of the Firefin logo. The bandana's color is an inverted version of the wearer's ink color or a variation of it. The bandana is wrapped around the wearer's head and knotted at the front.

name: FishFry_Visor
description: The FishFry Visor a somewhat large visor with a thick dark gray band. It is decorated with the Firefin logo on the left side towards the front, with a small symbol next to it. The brim, Firefin logo, small symbol, and a section of the band in the back all change color to match that of the wearer's ink, though they do not always match it exactly.

name: Jet_Cap
description: The Jet Cap is a patchwork baseball cap with a white brim and front patch. The patterned patches of the cap changes color to fit the wearer's ink. From left to right, a FishFry silhouette in a uneven pattern, plain, pale "X" pattern, and a half of Firefin text logo conspicuously visible, and the brim features grey Inkling numerals that resembles the number 2014. The hat is worn at a slightly crooked angle. Finished with a dark grey strapping closure.

name: Jungle_Hat
description: The Jungle Hat is a floppy wide-brimmed, Boonie hat, completely covered in a camouflage pattern that changes color to match that of the wearer's Ink, with the band being slightly duller.

name: Knitted_Hat
description: The Knitted Hat is a solid-colored knit cap. It changes color to match the wearer's ink. Along the front is the Firefin name in white lettering and on the left side is a metal Firefin logo.

name: Octoglasses
description: The Octoglasses are a pair of red sunglasses that are worn by resting on the forehead of the player. The glasses are a shade of deep red with two gold circles to mimic an octopus' suckers. The lenses are transparent, and are tinted a dark color.
